ai-mil3.7.2:0.3_0: and he gained the virtues of the Buddha,
ai-mil3.7.2:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, you must tell them that
ai-mil3.7.2:1.3_0: ‘If you were to die at the wrong time, I wouldn’t get caught up in the various kinds of people.’ And I don’t kill them.”’
ai-mil3.7.2:2.1_0: “What do you think, great king, is a small thing?”
ai-mil3.7.2:2.3_0: “ great king, what is a hundred spending the stilt longhouse that’s even though it’s a boat?”
ai-mil3.7.2:2.5_0: “Great king, that’s how to be seen.”
ai-mil3.7.2:4.1_0: The second gaining of the Buddha’s virtues, in the second enquiry,
